title: Portfolio
text: Used React.js, Bootstrap, and CSS for an interactive frontend. JavaScript functions were implemented to fetch images and create individual cards by pulling data from a JSON file.

title: AniSim
text: React.js, Bootstrap, and CSS for the frontend and Node.js with Express.js and JavaScript for the backend, including user login. MySQL manages authentication. For NLP, I’m using Hugging Face’s transformers library in Python to analyze anime titles, integrating it with data from the AniList API.

title: Valentine Website
text: Create a Valentine's site with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS where hovering over the 'No' button makes it move away from the cursor.

title: ZotEvents
text: Uses Selenium to scrape UCI Events page. Applies the Google Maps API to make finding UCI event locations easier. Uses React.JS and CSS for front end, and JavaScript for backend.
